mainEntity.name: What is QUANNEX and how does it work?

acceptedAnswer.text: QUANNEX is a consciousness technology platform that uses AI guidance and quantum principles to help individuals connect with their future selves. Through personalized daily protocols, quantum parameter tracking, and advanced visualization techniques, users systematically expand their consciousness and unlock their quantum potential.

Divine Intelligence (DI) is the AI persona at the heart of QUANNEX that serves as your personal guide. DI provides personalized daily protocols, meditation guidance, and insights tailored to your specific consciousness development journey and future self integration.

mainEntity.name: What are the five quantum parameters?

acceptedAnswer.text: The five quantum parameters are: 1) Observation - focused awareness and perception mastery, 2) Resonance - vibrational harmony and frequency attunement, 3) Entanglement - deep connections with future self, 4) Superposition - embracing multiple consciousness states, and 5) Coherence - achieving alignment and harmony in consciousness.

mainEntity.name: Is QUANNEX based on real science?

acceptedAnswer.text: QUANNEX uses quantum physics concepts metaphorically to structure consciousness development practices. While exploring potentials beyond mainstream science, we ground our framework in established consciousness research and provide dual-perspective explanations that resonate with both spiritual and scientific worldviews.

mainEntity.name: When will the QUANNEX app be available?

acceptedAnswer.text: The QUANNEX MVP is currently in development with a planned release in 2025. You can support the project and get early access through our Kickstarter campaign. The initial release will include core features like Divine Intelligence guidance, quantum parameter tracking, and future self connection protocols.
